title: Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument: Social Networking
body: Social Networking Media       Join us online to stay connected and learn what is happening in Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument. We want to connect with you, and keep you connected to us, by meeting you at the places you are currently at, and where you expect us to be online. Follow us today!         Facebook Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument has a page on Facebook you can "like." Here, you will be able to share with us and others your experiences in the park, including photographs from your visit. We will also try to keep you updated on what's new and quiz you on park trivia.         Twitter Follow @FlorissantNPS on Twitter and receive updates on breaking news in the park, social events, and "what is happening now".
